Warhammer Quest: The Adventure Card Game
boardgame.description: Join forces with legendary heroes to brave the many dangers of a cavernous dungeon. Wield potent weapons and magic. Conquer hordes of vile monsters. Discover fabulous treasures._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Warhammer Quest: The Adventure Card Game is a cooperative game of heroic dungeon adventures for one to four players. Players assume the roles of some of the Old World's most iconic heroes, then venture into the shadows to battle ghouls, Goblins, Skaven, giant bats, swarms of rats, and other monsters._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Can you survive their relentless onslaught? Can you press deeper into their lair to find the evil villain that drives them forward? There are only two ways for your quest to end _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; in death or in glory!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

- Photo album: https://goo.gl/photos/PWKv9y4Y9jc2With6 - Played only about 5 times, so tokens and such are in great condition. - Fully sleeved since the moment it left the box, so all cards are in like-new condition. The larger _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;quest cards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; were always kept wrapped in plastic baggies, so they_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re also pristine. - Box and rulebooks have only exceedingly minor corner-wear (no more so than some new games do right out of the box). - The original box inlay was cut apart and refactored to make a better-fitting one, thus the inlay is not in original condition. - Two of the original black dice were chipped right out of the box, but i was sent replacements, thus the box contains two more black dice than a normal set (including the two damaged dice). - Ships from Southern Germany. Game box weight is 803 grams (not including any packaging needed for shipping). - Reason for selling: rage-quit - the game is far too sadistic for my tastes. - Feel free to contact me with questions or requests for photos of specific components.
Only played once. Complete and in excellent condition. Includes colour copies of four BGG-fan-expansions.
